00033 //----------------------------------------------------------
00034 GrPolygonBINode::GrPolygonBINode( unsigned int& depth, GrPolygonBITree* parent, const GrPolygonGroup& group )
00035 : _polygon( ~0 )
00036 , _boundingAxis( EA_X )
00037 , _isLeaf( 0 )
00038 , _min( 0.0f )
00039 , _max( 0.0f )
00040 {
00041         ++_instanceCount;
00042 
00044         unsigned int polyCount = group.GetPolygonCount();
00045 
00047         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[ polyCount ];
00048         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < polyCount; ++i )
00049                 indices[ i ] = i;
00050 
00052         BuildTree( depth, parent, group, indices, polyCount );
00053 
00055         delete[] indices;
00056 }
00057 
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 GrPolygonBINode::GrPolygonBINode( unsigned int& depth, GrPolygonBITree* parent, const GrPolygonGroup& group,
00060                                                                   unsigned int* indices, unsigned int polyCount )
00061 : _polygon( ~0 )
00062 , _boundingAxis( EA_X )
00063 , _isLeaf( 0 )
00064 , _min( 0.0f )
00065 , _max( 0.0f )
00066 {
00068         BuildTree( depth, parent, group, indices, polyCount );
00069         ++_instanceCount;
00070 }

00072 //----------------------------------------------------------
00073 GrPolygonBINode::~GrPolygonBINode()
00074 {
00075         if ( !_isLeaf )
00076         {
00077                 delete _children[ 0 ];
00078                 delete _children[ 1 ];
00079         }
00080 
00082         --_instanceCount;
00083 
00086         if ( _instanceCount == 0 )
00087                 _allocator.FreeMem();
00088 }

00095 //----------------------------------------------------------
00096 void
00097 GrPolygonBINode::GetPolygons( UFastArray< unsigned int >& polygonIndices,
00098                                                           const SVec3& boxMin, const SVec3& boxMax )
00099 {
00102         float p0 = boxMin[ _boundingAxis ];
00103         float p1 = boxMax[ _boundingAxis ];
00104         if ( p1 < _min )
00105                 return;
00106         if ( p0 > _max )
00107                 return;
00108 
00110         if ( !_isLeaf )
00111         {
00113                 _children[ ES_FRONT ]->GetPolygons( polygonIndices, boxMin, boxMax );
00114                 _children[ ES_BACK  ]->GetPolygons( polygonIndices, boxMin, boxMax );
00115         }
00116         else
00117         {
00121                 polygonIndices.Push() = _polygon;
00122         }
00123 }

00146 //----------------------------------------------------------
00147 void
00148 GrPolygonBINode::BuildTree( unsigned int& depth, GrPolygonBITree* parent, const GrPolygonGroup& group,
00149                                                         unsigned int* indices, unsigned int polyCount )
00150 {
00152         static unsigned int treeDepth = 0;
00153 
00155         ++treeDepth;
00156         depth = Max( depth, treeDepth );
00157 
00159         _children[ 0 ] = 0;
00160         _children[ 1 ] = 0;
00161 
00163         float maxAxis[ 3 ] = { -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX };
00164         float minAxis[ 3 ] = {  FLT_MAX,  FLT_MAX,  FLT_MAX };
00165         double invPolyCount = 1.0 / polyCount;
00166         double center[ 3 ] = { 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 };
00167         for ( unsigned int p = 0; p < polyCount; ++p )
00168         {
00170                 unsigned int curIdx = indices[ p ];
00171 
00173                 const GrPolygon& curPolygon = group.GetPolygon( curIdx );
00174                 unsigned int vertCount = curPolygon.GetVertexCount();
00175                 for ( unsigned int v = 0; v < vertCount; ++v )
00176                 {
00178                         const SVec3& curVertex = curPolygon.GetVertex( v ).position;
00179 
00181                         minAxis[ EA_X ] = Min( minAxis[ EA_X ], curVertex.x );
00182                         minAxis[ EA_Y ] = Min( minAxis[ EA_Y ], curVertex.y );
00183                         minAxis[ EA_Z ] = Min( minAxis[ EA_Z ], curVertex.z );
00184                         maxAxis[ EA_X ] = Max( maxAxis[ EA_X ], curVertex.x );
00185                         maxAxis[ EA_Y ] = Max( maxAxis[ EA_Y ], curVertex.y );
00186                         maxAxis[ EA_Z ] = Max( maxAxis[ EA_Z ], curVertex.z );
00187                 }
00188 
00190                 center[ 0 ] += invPolyCount * curPolygon.GetVertex( 0 ).position.x;
00191                 center[ 1 ] += invPolyCount * curPolygon.GetVertex( 0 ).position.y;
00192                 center[ 2 ] += invPolyCount * curPolygon.GetVertex( 0 ).position.z;
00193         }
00194 
00196         float xExt = maxAxis[ EA_X ] - minAxis[ EA_X ];
00197         float yExt = maxAxis[ EA_Y ] - minAxis[ EA_Y ];
00198         float zExt = maxAxis[ EA_Z ] - minAxis[ EA_Z ];
00199         if ( xExt > yExt )
00200         {
00201                 if ( xExt > zExt )
00202                         _boundingAxis = EA_X;
00203                 else
00204                         _boundingAxis = EA_Z;
00205         }
00206         else
00207         {
00208                 if ( yExt > zExt )
00209                         _boundingAxis = EA_Y;
00210                 else
00211                         _boundingAxis = EA_Z;
00212         }
00213 
00215         _min = minAxis[ _boundingAxis ];
00216         _max = maxAxis[ _boundingAxis ];
00217         float axisCenter = ( float )center[ _boundingAxis ];
00218 
00220         if ( polyCount > 1 )
00221         {
00226                 unsigned int back = polyCount - 1;
00227                 unsigned int front = 0;
00228                 for ( unsigned int classified = 0; classified < polyCount; ++classified )
00229                 {
00231                         unsigned int curIdx = indices[ front ];
00232 
00234                         const GrPolygon& curPolygon = group.GetPolygon( curIdx );
00235                         const SVec3& curPos = curPolygon.GetVertex( 0 ).position;
00236 
00240                         if ( curPos[ _boundingAxis ] < axisCenter )
00241                         {
00242                                 Swap( indices[ front ], indices[ back ] );
00243                                 --back;
00244                         }
00245                         else
00246                         {
00247                                 ++front;
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250 
00252                 unsigned int backCount = polyCount - front;
00253 
00257                 if ( backCount == 0 )
00258                 {
00259                         B_ASSERT( front > 1 );
00260                         unsigned int swap = front / 2;
00261                         back -= swap;
00262                         front -= swap;
00263                         backCount += swap;
00264                 }
00265                 if ( front == 0 )
00266                 {
00267                         B_ASSERT( backCount > 1 );
00268                         unsigned int swap = backCount / 2;
00269                         back += swap;
00270                         front += swap;
00271                         backCount -= swap;
00272                 }
00273 
00274                 B_ASSERT( ( backCount + front ) == polyCount );
00275 
00277                 if ( backCount > 0 )
00278                         _children[ ES_BACK      ] = new GrPolygonBINode( depth, parent, group, indices + front, backCount );
00279                 if ( front > 0 )
00280                         _children[ ES_FRONT ] = new GrPolygonBINode( depth, parent, group, indices, front );
00281         }
00282         else
00283         {
00286                 B_ASSERT( polyCount == 1 );
00287 
00289                 _polygon = indices[ 0 ];
00290                 _isLeaf = 1;
00291         }
00292 
00294         --treeDepth;
00295 }
